pullrequest.title: Bullet: Fixed joints and inertia matrices with non-zero values on their off-diagonal

content.raw:
That’s great. Back in the day \([#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1747/support-for-fixed-joints/diff](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1747/support-for-fixed-joints/diff)\) I had to implement the bullet fixed joint as a `btHingeConstraint` for failures in the `joint_get_force_torque` integration tests.  
 I guess the test is now working, so something have been fixed either in Gazebo or in Bullet in the meanwhile.
content.html:
That’s great. Back in the day (#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/1747/support-for-fixed-joints/diff) I had to implement the bullet fixed joint as a btHingeConstraint for failures in the joint_get_force_torque integration tests.
I guess the test is now working, so something have been fixed either in Gazebo or in Bullet in the meanwhile.
